name: Simple_Living_Emmerson_Coffee_Table
reviews: Love this table. I was very pleased with the quality and beauty of the wood. For the price, this can't be beat.
easily put together in about 30 min

The 4 stars is really a 5 but because the description is not 100% accurate, I could only do 4 stars. The frame is BLACK. There is no dark brown to it. The easiest piece of furniture I ever assembled and it is packed really well. Took me as long to remove it from the carton as it did to put it together. About 10 minutes total and 5 minute assembly!! It's a beautiful piece of furniture at a great price!!
description:
Place this Simple Living Emmerson Coffee Table in any home to
create stunning centerpiece. The black metal frame is accented with
the natural solid wood top featuring a chevron pattern. The
contrasting design of this table creates an eye-catching design
that will look glamorous in your home for years.Chevron patterned table topSlightly distressed natural color solid wood top with black
  color metal legsIncludes: One (1) end tableMaterials: Solid wood, metalTable finish: NaturalEnd table sold separatelyTable dimensions: 18 inches high x 49.1 inches wide x 26
  inches deepStyleTransitionalMaterialMetal, WoodTypeCoffee Tables, Sofa TablesFinishNatural FinishShapeRectangleAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlack
